message: Bob, I'm offering you the product for $1200000. This is a fair price considering its unique value. I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for your business. Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the price of $1200000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1050000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I acknowledge your budget constraints, $1050000 doesn't quite meet my expectations for this product. Given its unique capabilities and potential for your business, I'm willing to come down to $1100000.  I believe this price is still fair and beneficial for both of us. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I understand your position, Alice. Thank you for adjusting your offer. I will consider this carefully. My counteroffer is $1075000. I hope this proposal will be more favorable for us both.
